entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person who found Mr. Crouch on the grounds.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Alastor Moody is introduced as a person who greets Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore's office is mentioned, and his desk has Cornelius Fudge standing beside it.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is introduced as a person who greets Harry.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as the person who turned up on the grounds.

entities.name: harry potter's office
entities.description: Dumbledore's office is described as a beautiful, circular room.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school where Mr. Crouch turned up on the grounds.

relationships.description: Harry found Mr. Crouch on the grounds.
